textJp: 「変わった質問をしましたね。
ひょっとして今日、寝不足ですか？
いけませんよー、成長期は良く食べよく寝て育つんですから」
textEn: Perhaps you didn't sleep well last night?
You can't do that. You have to sleep and eat well to grow up fine."

textJp: 「圭ちゃんに詩音のヤツが、ちょっかい出して来たのを無視してね〜！
…圭一くん、だから祭の前の日は、よく寝た方がいいよって言ったのに…。」
textEn: "And he ignored it when that troublemaker Shion came up and made a pass at him~!
...Keiichi-kun, this is why I said to get a good night's sleep before the festival..."

textJp: 「俺昨日、寝不足で半分頭がぼおっとなっててさ…。
怪しいお注射で自由を奪って、私だけの専属メイドに〜〜…☆」
思春期のシャイな悩み、大いに歓迎ですよ〜☆」
textEn: "You know, yesterday I didn't really get enough sleep and my head's a bit fuzzy...
I could steal their agency with a suspicious injection, and have them be my personal maids~~...☆"
I greatly welcome any shy, bashful worries you might have as you come into puberty~☆."

textJp: 「睡眠導入剤を入れて。種類は任せます。
textEn: "Mix in the sedative you think best for the occasion.

textJp: 「…県警の発表では、他殺の可能性が極めて高いと…。」
口と手を一緒に動かすのは落語家だけ。
textEn: "...According to the statement from the prefectural police department, the possibility is extremely high that she was murdered..."
Only stage actors do both at once.
